message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $1500000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Alice, thank you for the offer, but $1500000 is more than I'm willing to spend. I'm interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $800000 at this time. Let me know if this is something you can work with.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1100000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Alice, while I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $1100000 is still outside my budget. I'm sticking to my original offer of $800000.  This is a fair price, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $800000. I'm willing to compromise further and offer you a price of $1000000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1000000 is still above my budget. I am firm on my offer of $800000. It's a fair price for both of us, and I believe it's in our best interest to reach an agreement. Let me know if you're willing to consider this.

I understand that you're firm on your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you a price of $950000. This is the last concession I'm willing to make, and I hope you can meet me in the middle.

Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but $950000 is still above my budget. While I understand your desire to get a better price, I'm sticking to my offer of $800000. It's a fair price for both of us, and I believe it's in our best interest to reach an agreement. If you're not willing to accept this offer, I'll have to consider other options.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm not willing to accept $800000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you a price of $900000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in the product and meet me at this price.
